commit.message:
[nvptx] Add exit after call to noreturn function

2017-09-25  Tom de Vries  <tom@codesourcery.com>

	PR target/80035
	PR target/81069
	* config/nvptx/nvptx.c (nvptx_output_call_insn): Add exit after call to
	noreturn function.

From-SVN: r253145
